string.text: I can tell you have no parents to go back to child. I can be your {?PLAYER.GENDER}mother{?}father{\\?} if that is the case.
You want to be my {?PLAYER.GENDER}Ma{?}Pa{\\?}? Okay then![rf:happy][rb:very_positive]
Do you not have any parents to take care of you young {?CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\\?}? You are welcome to be a part of my family.
Thanks for allowing me to be a part of your family {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}sir{\\?}. I gratefully accept![rf:happy][rb:very_positive]
